_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The six qualities that make a mendicant: Don’t generate enthusiasm to achieve skillful qualities not yet achieved
Don’t protect skillful qualities they have achieved
Don’t try to persevere in the task
Generate enthusiasm to achieve skillful qualities not yet achieved
Protect skillful qualities they have achieved
Try to persevere in the task
